lines.gurmukhi: jYsIAY srd ins qYsy eI pUrn sis; vYsy eI kusm dl ishjw suvwrI hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as the night of winter month is, so is the moon radiant this night. The fragrant buds of the flowers have adorned the bed.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijho ijhI A`j srd rwq hY, iqho ijhw pUrn cMdRmw hY srd ru`q dI puMinAwˆ dw Aqy auho ijhy hI sIql Pu`lwˆ dIAwˆ pMKVIAw nwl ishjw sMvwrI hoeI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsI ey jobn bYs qYsy eI AnUp rUp; vYsy eI isMgwr cwru gun AiDkwrI hY [

Unknown.translation: On one side is the young age while on the other side is incomparable beauty. Similarly there is adornment of Naam Simran on one side while on the other is plenitude of virtues.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijho ijhI ieDr jvwn -aumrw hY; auho ijhw hI auDr byimswl suMdr rUp hY iesy qrHwˆ hI sohxy iSMgwr lg rhy hn jYsy ik auDr ivSyS gux AwpxI ivSySqw rKdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy eI CbIlY nYn qYsy eI rsIly bYn; soBq prspr mihmw ApwrI hY [

Unknown.translation: On one side are attractive and shining eyes while on the other hand are sweet words full of nectar. Thus within these the beauty beyond words is sitting in state.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijho ijhy auDr suMdr nyqr hn auho ijhy hIauDr rsdwiek im`Ty bcn hn, Awpo ivcdI pRIqm qy pRymI dI mihmw Apwr soB rhI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy eI pRbIn ipRX pÎwro pRym risk hYN; vYsy eI bicqR Aiq pRymnI ipAwrI hY [655[

Unknown.translation: Just as the beloved master is adept in the art of love, so is the strange and astonishing amorous feelings and love of the beloved seeker.  (655)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijho ijhy ik ipAwry pRIqm jI pRym dy inpuMn rsIey hn; iqho ijhI hI pRymkw AiqAMq vicqR ipAwrI hY ]655]
